ModMetaData.name: Posthuman Drift: Chyrr Xenotype
ModMetaData.author: Xylthixlm
ModMetaData.description: Adds the Chyrr xenotype and associated genes.\n\nChyrr are blind, flying mystics native to steaming jungles and sun-blasted deserts. They perceive the world through sound and low-level psychic sensing, aided by a hazy thread of precognition that lets them act just before things happen. Though physically fragile, they defend themselves with a keening cry that leaves foes reeling.
